attributes.action: to look at the extremly high interest rates charged by credit card companies
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: credit cards are used by a majority of people in this country, the interest rates charged since the credit crunch have become very high  as the companies use a variable rate, it is time that these companies where brought into line, and pass on the interest rate cuts instead of charging customers high amounts of interest,had credit card companies operated a responsible lending policy prior to the credit crunch then maybe their would not be record amounts going bankrupt.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
